entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:20 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 29. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:20 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 38 in the evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:20 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023
